PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PropertyAgreement
PropertySetDef.Definition:
Definition from IAI: A property agreement is an agreement that enables the occupation of a property for a period of time.
The objective is to capture the information within an agreement that is relevant to a facilities manager. Design and construction information associated with the property is not considered. A property agreement may be applied to an instance of IfcSpatialStructureElement including to compositions defined through the IfcSpatialStructureElement.Element.CompositionEnum.
Note that the associated actors are captured by the IfcOccupant class.

PropertyDef.Name: AgreementType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of property agreement from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: Identifier
PropertyDef.Definition: The identifier assigned to the agreement for the purposes of tracking.

PropertyDef.Name: Version
PropertyDef.Definition: The version number of the agreement that is identified

PropertyDef.Name: VersionDate
PropertyDef.Definition: The date on which the version of the agreement became applicable

PropertyDef.Name: PropertyName
PropertyDef.Definition: Addressing details of the property as stated within the agreement

PropertyDef.Name: CommencementDate
PropertyDef.Definition: Date on which the agreement commences

PropertyDef.Name: TerminationDate
PropertyDef.Definition: Date on which the agreement terminates

PropertyDef.Name: Duration
PropertyDef.Definition: The period of time for the lease. Note that values should be given in year/day/month and not in hour/minute/second.

PropertyDef.Name: Options
PropertyDef.Definition: A statement of the options available in the agreement

PropertyDef.Name: ConditionCommencement
PropertyDef.Definition: Condition of property provided on commencement of the agreement e.g. cold shell, warm lit shell, broom clean, turn-key

PropertyDef.Name: Restrictions
PropertyDef.Definition: Restrictions that may be placed by a competent authority

PropertyDef.Name: ConditionTermination
PropertyDef.Definition: Condition of property required on termination of the agreement e.g. cold shell, warm lit shell, broom clean, turn-key
